sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useParams, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useQuery, useMutation } from 'react-query'; import { Calendar, Users, DollarSign, MapPin, Clock, Edit3, Share2, Download, Heart, Star, Navigation, Car, Utensils, Bed } from 'lucide-react'; import axios from 'axios'; import toast from 'react-hot-toast'; const ItineraryDetail = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false); const { data: itinerary, isLoading } = useQuery( ['itinerary', id], () => axios.get(`/api/itineraries/${id}`).then(res => res.data), { enabled: !!id, } ); const updateItineraryMutation = useMutation( (data) => axios.put(`/api/itineraries/${id}`, data), { onSuccess: () => { toast.success('Itinerary updated successfully!'); setIsEditing(false); }, onError: (error) => { toast.error('Failed to update itinerary'); console.error('Update error:', error); } } ); const handleUpdateItinerary = (updatedData) => { updateItineraryMutation.mutate(updatedData); }; if (isLoading) { return (
); } if (!itinerary) { return (

Itinerary not found

Create New Itinerary
); } return (
{/* Header */}

{itinerary.title}

{itinerary.description}

{/* Main Content */}
{/* Trip Summary */}

Trip Summary

Duration: {itinerary.duration.days} days, {itinerary.duration.nights} nights
Travelers: {itinerary.travelers.adults} adults, {itinerary.travelers.children} children
Budget: ₹{itinerary.budget.min} - ₹{itinerary.budget.max}
Status: {itinerary.status}
{/* Day-by-Day Itinerary */}

Day-by-Day Itinerary

{itinerary.days && itinerary.days.length > 0 ? ( itinerary.days.map((day, index) => (

Day {day.dayNumber}

{day.date && ( {new Date(day.date).toLocaleDateString()} )}
{/* Activities */} {day.activities && day.activities.length > 0 && (

Activities

{day.activities.map((activity, actIndex) => (
{activity.activity}
{activity.destination && (

at {activity.destination.name}

)} {activity.notes && (

{activity.notes}

)}
{activity.startTime} - {activity.endTime}
{activity.cost && (
₹{activity.cost}
)}
{activity.transport && (
{activity.transport.mode} - {activity.transport.duration} {activity.transport.cost && ` (₹${activity.transport.cost})`}
)}
))}
)} {/* Accommodation */} {day.accommodation && (

Accommodation

{day.accommodation.name}

{day.accommodation.location}

{day.accommodation.cost && ( ₹{day.accommodation.cost} )}
)} {/* Meals */} {day.meals && day.meals.length > 0 && (

Meals

{day.meals.map((meal, mealIndex) => (
{meal.name} ({meal.type}) {meal.location && (

{meal.location}

)}
{meal.cost && ( ₹{meal.cost} )}
))}
)} {day.totalCost && (
Day Total: ₹{day.totalCost}
)}
)) ) : (

No activities planned yet

This itinerary is still being planned. Check back later for updates.

)}
{/* Feedback */} {itinerary.feedback && (

Trip Feedback

Rating:
{[...Array(5)].map((_, i) => ( ))}

{itinerary.feedback.comment}

{itinerary.feedback.improvements && itinerary.feedback.improvements.length > 0 && (

Suggested Improvements:

    {itinerary.feedback.improvements.map((improvement, index) => (
  • {improvement}
    • ))}
)}
)}
{/* Sidebar */}
{/* Trip Overview */}

Trip Overview

Total Cost: ₹{itinerary.totalCost || 'TBD'}
AI Generated: {itinerary.aiGenerated ? 'Yes' : 'No'}
Public: {itinerary.isPublic ? 'Yes' : 'No'}
{/* Actions */}

Actions

{/* Preferences */} {itinerary.preferences && (

Preferences

{itinerary.preferences.interests && itinerary.preferences.interests.length > 0 && (
Interests:
{itinerary.preferences.interests.map((interest, index) => ( {interest} ))}
)} {itinerary.preferences.accommodation && (
Accommodation: {itinerary.preferences.accommodation}
)}
)} {/* Shared With */} {itinerary.sharedWith && itinerary.sharedWith.length > 0 && (

Shared With

{itinerary.sharedWith.map((share, index) => (
{share.user.name} {share.permission}
))}
)}
); }; export default ItineraryDetail;
